perturbation.original_text:
Whereas, Ultragenyx intends to process the Product into a pharmaceutical product in the meaning of Sec. 2 German Pharmaceuticals Act (Arzneimittelgesetz—AMG) and to market the processed Product in the Field (as defined below) (hereinafter referred to as the "Purpose"); and

Whereas, Ultragenyx intends to obtain regulatory approval for the processed Product as a pharmaceutical product in the meaning of Sec. 2 AMG.
perturbation.changed_text:
Whereas, Ultragenyx intends to process the Product into a pharmaceutical product in the meaning of Sec. 2 German Pharmaceuticals Act (Arzneimittelgesetz—AMG) and to market the processed Product in the Field (as defined below) (hereinafter referred to as the "Goal"); and

Whereas, Ultragenyx intends to obtain regulatory approval for the processed Product as a pharmaceutical product in the meaning of Sec. 2 AMG.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Purpose' is replaced with 'Goal'. While seemingly synonymous, 'Purpose' is defined in relation to the marketing of the processed product. Using 'Goal' introduces ambiguity as 'Goal' is not consistently or clearly defined, potentially leading to confusion regarding the specific intentions and obligations of Ultragenyx as related to its business activities with the product.

perturbation.original_text: Subject to the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement Cremer shall supply Ultragenyx with the Product free from defect and meeting the product specification attached to this Agreement as Annex A (the "Product Specifications").
perturbation.changed_text: Subject to the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement Cremer shall supply Ultragenyx with the Product free from defect and meeting the product specification attached to this Agreement as Annex A (the "Product Standards").
perturbation.explanation: The term "Product Specifications" is replaced with "Product Standards". This creates confusion as the agreement refers to Annex A as both "Product Specifications" and "Product Standards". Whether these terms hold the same legal meaning is uncertain, leading to disputes over the criteria for acceptable product quality. It will remain unsure which definition is relevant.

perturbation.original_text: Cremer represents and warrants that all quantities of Product delivered under the Agreement were manufactured in accordance with GMP. The Product shall be free from defects if it is within the specifications according to Annex A.
perturbation.changed_text: Cremer represents and warrants that all quantities of Product delivered under the Agreement were manufactured in accordance with GMP. The Product shall be free from defects if it is within the guidelines according to Annex A.
perturbation.explanation: The use of 'guidelines' instead of 'specifications' in relation to the 'Product' and Annex A introduces a critical ambiguity. 'Specifications' implies a set of precise and mandatory requirements that the product must meet. 'Guidelines' suggests a more flexible set of recommendations. This change will affect how the quality and acceptability of the Product are judged.
